Uses of Class
asianFlash.InternalFlashCard

  • Packages that use InternalFlashCard 
    Package Description
    asianFlash
    This package contains the objects for the asianFlash program.

    • Uses of InternalFlashCard in asianFlash

      Fields in asianFlash declared as InternalFlashCard 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private InternalFlashCard CardTest.currentCard
      Pointer to the current card being displayed.
      private InternalFlashCard InternalFlashCard.next
      Pointer to the next card in card set.
      private InternalFlashCard InternalFlashCard.previous
      Pointer to the previous card in the card set.
      private InternalFlashCard CardTest.previousCard
      Pointer to the previous card displayed.
      static InternalFlashCard AsianFlash.theFlashCardList
      Flash card set being tested.
      Methods in asianFlash that return InternalFlashCard 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InternalFlashCard CardTest.getCurrentCard()
      This operation returns the current card in the test.
      InternalFlashCard AsianFlashDOM.getFlashCardSet(boolean loadFullTest, String theFileName)
      This operation returns a list of flash cards, built from data contained in the XML file.
      InternalFlashCard CardTest.getNewCard()
      This operation returns a new card to display.
      private InternalFlashCard CardTest.getNewCardNotShown()
      This operation returns a new card that is randomly generated, but has not been viewed previously.
      private InternalFlashCard CardTest.getNewCardRandom()
      This operation returns a new card when the test mode is random, skipping passed cards.
      InternalFlashCard InternalFlashCard.getNextCard()
      This operator returns a pointer to the next FlashCard object in a list after the current object.
      InternalFlashCard CardTest.getNextCard()
      This operation returns the next card in the list of cards for the test.
      InternalFlashCard InternalFlashCard.getPreviousCard()
      This operator returns a pointer to the previous FlashCard object in a list before the current object.
      InternalFlashCard CardTest.getPreviousCard()
      This operation returns the previous card in the list of cards for the test.
      private InternalFlashCard AsianFlashDOM.processCard(Element theCardElement, String cardFileName, boolean loadFullTest)
      This method processes the XML for a flash card.
      Methods in asianFlash with parameters of type InternalFlashCard 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void InternalFlashCard.addNewCardToList(InternalFlashCard theNewCard)
      This operator adds a new card to a the end of a list of cards.
